comments.body: It sounds weird but I’m up for it :)
cool idea Real ZombieManF i like the idea of shroom bugs
i just searched them up and they look like beluga whales, unless thats what they are
this sounds like a great idea!
Sería genial
regular creepers are green, and the opposite of green on the color wheel is red.  red creepers it is then?
Cool idea!
that would be awesome in mc, but Maby it can have different types of wings and colors of fur along with unnatural animal colors like blue and purple

https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360048049372-Silk-Silk-Block

You may want to edit your post to just include silkworms. :) Just look for the wheel/cog option at the top of your post and edit it.
I love this, although I would prefer that Silkworms be added as a new cave mob, and their silk could glow in the dark!
Actually, a long time ago, during the time of the silk road, silk was good for trade, So it should make you more popular with the villagers.
When silkworms are mounted, silk and silk thread processed from it are also mounted, from which clothes can be made.

Love the idea, but think string would work better as a drop. This would be peaceful mode friendly way of obtaining string without harvesting webs from mineshafts. And, spider farms are quite frankly tedious. String is notoriously hard to farm a large quantity of.

I absolutely agree.
Also it would be cool flying with an elytra with your parrot beside you.

100% agree with each one, but I think instead of just completely changing it from 0.75 of a block as max distance to 2.5 wouldn't be realistic. Giving them a "breed" parameter where they randomize a stat once they're spawned in would, in my opinion, be better. This could give a range of 0.3 -> 3.5 (minimum fall distance before damage is 4) and could be called "startleParrotDistance" as a way to say they got startled, and some mobs are easier to startle with the easiest being parrots with their startleParrotDistance set to 0.3.

I don't know anything though because I'm not a coder, game dev, or cool kid. I'm just a dork with random ideas.
sweet want this
Yea, keep them!
They make oceans challenging dude
Yeah but, I have died sooooooo many times because of them
I agree that there are annoying a bit and there's too much of them but not remove thm maybe they could try to make them spawn less in the ocean?
Baby zombies are way worse, there should be boss music when you fight one of them!
They get in the way
Guys! Stop commenting
The point of them is to make the oceans a bit more challenging
i get they’re trying to make the ocean a bit more challenging but it’s so annoying when there are 20 in one area and they’re not easy to kill

The only hostile mobs in the ocean are guardians, elder guardians and drowned. The guardians only spawn in ocean monuments and since they are rare, what dangers are in the oceans, just drowning. Mojang dont want to put sharks in the game for many reasons so the least you can do is enjoy the drowned as they are the only common hostile water mobs. And if they are annoying to you then just stay away from the ocean.

P.S. without them there are no tridents and tridents are pretty good weapons

Either remove the drowned or lower their spawn rate. I went to a spot where there was NO drowned at all. 5 minutes later theres at least 12 of them all ganging up on me. I get people want new variants of them but it is ridiculous the amount of drowned that spawn in a given area especially when theres none there to begin with. I miss the old minecraft where they didnt add in the drowned and just had the ocean monuments.
The spawn rate is too high
I don't want to remove them completely, but I wish I could disable certain mobs from spawning.  I know that there's the Bad Mobs mod, but the latest version of it is 1.16.5

Can't build a house on a river or ocean any more without being constantly, and I mean literally constantly, under attack from drowned. Let us disable them completely, they suck and are making me not play. Every time I go to launch the game, I remember I have stupid drowned to deal with and change my mind. Well done.

Moved to proper category.

Clarified subject to help search results. This really is about adding a polar fox. Your original subject is included at the top.

Thanks for your contribution.
I can't see a fox living on icebergs but yeah they should spawn so much more often. Foxes are found all over the world in all sorts of habitats
Actually, Unicorns can't fly. Pegasusses can
Good idea I will vote
I believe that idea is great in addition to the unicorn mutator
I will try this stuff right away!
also maybe different golems depending on village variants like moss golems or sand golems

Sorry but there is already a post that says just that.

Diamond Golems
expensive :)  And worth every diamond!
That does make sense.
I agree. Maybe the fuse should be slower.
Me like.

A mob like this could also hunt the player, if they were to add a netherite boat or a boat that works in lava, this mob could follow the boat and attack the player once on the shore, If it were to break the surface of the lava( you could see it swimming around the surface), as a way to signal to the player that it is hunting them, it would allow the player to attack it and kill it from the boat, before it can attack them.
this would work great now that people are making nether bridges now that basalt is generated but it would be nice if they were scared of striders
Yes, they should be scared of striders so that they don't pull you off when your out riding.

How would you figure out who to send it to? Maybe instead, have it be a book named the name of that player, and inside is the message. A book and quill, so it can be sent back and forth and needn't be remade every time. I'm not a huge fan of item carrying, but message carrying would be fun.

I like this concept sounds like wither variants. Maybe just different soul sand orientations with different Wither skull placement creates different kinds of withers . Wither hound, wither fish if created underwater etc. Different withers could drop different types of wither stars that give new effects to beacons. Love the additional endgame possibilities here.
Why a boss just do pvp two teams of two spawn in the same world you each build a base play like normal survival but when you see each other I would just be really fun pvp
I think you should add a few more bosses and how to spawn them.

It doesn’t sound very tough.  If I found one, I would just grab my bow enchanted with punch, and wreck it.  This is the first time I’ve said this to a post on here, but it seems a little underpowered.  But still, I think that the over world should be relatively peaceful, with no bosses.
Another way to find it, I guess. Journeyman level Cartographer Villager should be able to trade these maps!
flyable phantoms
Ummm... I don't think this idea is suitable for a game like Minecraft.
RageElixer38 OH MY GOD YES

They already make mobs for the upd4te and this extra one, among all other features. For fr33. The votes are for hyping the main live event and next release. Adding one feature was explained, involving a lot of work.
Agreed! Minecraft has taken mob after mob! They’re practically robbing us!
Pls capybaras on Minecraft
CAPYBARA!!!!!!!
i want capybars
It's not that simple an issue.

If fireflies fell under the particle category it would allow it to be a controllable ambiance, so slower machines could run them, but still have the effect. though the lack of light rendering for moving objects (without mods) is currently limited as I understand. Still, having "bug" particles would liven up places, with the option for a user to dial it down to increase preformance.
It really is that simple. You'd have to be bug-brained to think otherwise. Deleting the code for frogs eating fireflies would take literal seconds, 45 at most
The makers of this game should not have rejected ducks if they would have had a different model from chickens.
Rats don't sound very appealing although the idea is great. Maybe we could call them mice?

Cool. To make it more different, camels should also be able to transport villagers too. Currently villagers could only ride boats and mine carts, which aren’t very reliable when transporting them to new places.
Maybe not meat, but chests and carpets would be great! Gains my vote!

While it makes sense, it also needs to be balanced for MC. They shouldn't have the storage option since that takes away the benefit of the mounts that do, and camels already have unique benefits unlike the others. Also, it's likely not promoted to slay them, so they may not drop anything.
CAMELS ARE CONFIRMED FOR 1.20! yay. Not everything listed from this post, but they can carry a player and dash over rivers! Unlike horses. I hope they can carry chests as well.
I really want them to carry chest and have carpet on them!!
That is absolutely adorable! You have my vote!
Is Good
um .. no, this isn't pokemon
